channel.title: Realscape The Best oldschool server ever(creativescape based
channel.description:
It is online 24/7 no lagg 15players Many people have played this server. This server is old school, so you guys who want god swords and pvp armor, this is not a server for you. [b][u]----------------------links------------------------[/u][/b] [img]http://i49.tinypic.com/2rfpyqt.gif[/img][b]Webclient(Under construction[/b] www.realscapee.webs.com/chooseaworld.htm [img]http://i49.tinypic.com/2rfpyqt.gif[/img][b]Client Download[/b] http://www.multiupload.com/QLDK1Y3NEE [img]http://i49.tinypic.com/24w6jhx.png[/img][b]Forums[/b] http://realscapee.webs.com/apps/forums [img]http://img21.imageshack.us/img21/4563/zgs.png[/img] [img]http://img197.imageshack.us/img197/5316/sgs.png[/img] [img]http://img27.imageshack.us/img27/9909/bgsx.png[/img] [img]http://img21.imageshack.us/img21/8959/agsv.png[/img] [b]5th Mini-Game release; Full Castle Wars[/b] [IMG]http://i30.tinypic.com/ae2q6e.png[/img] [b]Barrows Degrading[/b] [img]http://i31.tinypic.com/eq4c21.png[/img] [b]Cannon’s update.[/b] [IMG]http://i29.tinypic.com/2ccwfaw.gif[/img] [b]Treasure Trails[/b] 100% (377) RuneScape Treasure Trail rewards!: (200-300 items for each reward Level) [img]http://i32.tinypic.com/2vacfoh.gif[/img] [b]Mining[/b] [IMG]http://i49.tinypic.com/o5n5vp.png[/img] [b]Multi Spells[/b] [img]http://img88.imageshack.us/i/11044739.gif/[/[img] [img]http://img88.imageshack.us/img88/6930/11044739.gif[/img] [B]King Black Dragon Improvement(s)[/B] [IMG]http://bildites.lv/images/h6tmc5c9yr4jm5lfdcwh.gif[/img] [B]Chaos Elemental[/B] [URL=http://img340.imageshack.us/i/chaos.gif/][IMG]http://img340.imageshack.us/img340/5441/chaos.gif[/img][/URL] [b][u]Skills[/u][/b] [b]Herblore[/b] - [img]http://i42.tinypic.com/200yyvo.png[/img] [b]Fletching[/b] - [img]http://i40.tinypic.com/2i6hxfr.png[/img][/QUOTE] [size=12pt][b]Need some 1 who can make a Highscore and Webclient!! My server have mysql! You be ranked Admin on the server![/size]
Name: Age: Msn
[/b]
